Instruction: Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Lightly oil a medium baking sheet.
Combine the milk and margarine in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in the flour and continue stirring until the mixture thickens and forms a ball. Remove from heat.
Incorporate eggs into the mixture until well blended. Add Parmesan cheese, and mix until smooth.
Bake for about 15 minutes in the preheated oven until puffed and golden brown. Serve warm with marinara sauce for dipping.
